name: civitai-data-manager
tagline: A self-hosted manager for downloading and organizing AI models
description: Civitai Data Manager is a self-hosted tool for downloading and managing Stable Diffusion models from Civitai. It helps users organize, categorize, and efficiently update their local model collection.

features.title: Model Management
features.description: Download and organize Stable Diffusion models. Complete library

features.title: Civitai Integration
features.description: Direct integration with Civitai platform. Easy downloads

features.title: Categorization
features.description: Organize models by type and category. Smart organization

features.title: Update Tracking
features.description: Monitor and update model versions. Stay current

features.title: Local Collection
features.description: Manage your local model library. Efficient storage

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep your AI model collection private. Data control
